name: mwbot-ts
description: A simple yet flexible TypeScript framework for building MediaWiki bots in Node.js.

scripts.mwbot-log: node -e "const date = new Date().toISOString().replace(/\.\d+Z$/, '').replace(/[-T:]/g, ''); require('child_process').execSync(`ts-node src/test/test_mwbot.ts > logs/${date}_mwbot.txt 2>&1`);"
scripts.Title: ts-node src/test/test_Title.ts
scripts.Wikitext-log: node -e "const date = new Date().toISOString().replace(/\.\d+Z$/, '').replace(/[-T:]/g, ''); require('child_process').execSync(`ts-node src/test/test_Wikitext.ts > logs/${date}_Wikitext.txt 2>&1`);"
scripts.build: npm run prebuild & tsc -p . & node dist/generate-types.js
